amendment.description: To provide to the Indian Health Service an additional $25,000,000 for contract support costs and to provide to the Bureau of Indian Affairs an additional $26,000,000 for contract support costs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1039 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Barrasso. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2017) To provide to the Indian Health Service an additional $25,000,000 for contract support costs and to provide to the Bureau of Indian Affairs an additional $26,000,000 for contract support costs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Barrasso.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1039 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
